question: [File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Coin Type Asset Zero] Lines 288-292 have special handling for zero coin_type_asset_balance - if balance is 1 wei but treated as zero due to rounding, can operator steal dust amounts? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Op Value Update Flag] enable_op_value_update() at line 294 enables value update check - if this is called but end_op_value_update_with_bag is never called, does vault remain stuck in DURING_OPERATION? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Status Race] Between line 219 assert_during_operation() and line 294 enable_op_value_update(), if another transaction calls start_op, can status become inconsistent? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Receipt Asset Return] At line 268, Receipt assets are returned - if Receipt contains vault_id that doesn't match, does return_defi_asset validate the Receipt's vault_id field? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Loop Bounds] Lines 230-274 iterate based on defi_asset_ids.length() - if TxBag was created with 5 assets but Bag only contains 3, does the loop panic on remove() or continue? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Asset Skip] If defi_asset_type doesn't match any of the 5 type checks (lines 235-271), the asset remains in the Bag - does destroy_empty() at line 296 fail or pass? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Principal Return] return_free_principal() at line 286 - if principal_balance contains more than originally borrowed, does it update free_principal correctly or cause accounting error? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_with_bag()] [Multiple Asset Types] If an operation borrows both NaviAccountCap and CetusPosition but only returns NaviAccountCap, does the validation at end_op_value_update detect missing CetusPosition? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Asset Not Returned Check] Lines 326-350 check contains_asset_type() for each asset - if an asset was returned to wrong vault in end_op_with_bag(), does this check detect cross-vault contamination? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Receipt Missing Check] The check loop at lines 322-351 doesn't verify Receipt assets - if Receipt was borrowed but not returned, is it detected? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Loss Calculation Underflow] At line 362, if total_usd_value_after > total_usd_value_before due to rewards, loss remains 0 - but if values are near u256 boundaries, can subtraction underflow? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Tolerance Update Bypass] update_tolerance() at line 363 is only called if there's a loss - can an operator manipulate prices to show zero loss when actual loss occurred? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Share Verification] ERR_VERIFY_SHARE at line 366 compares total_shares with snapshot - if shares were minted in a separate operation that completed between start and value_update, does this falsely fail? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Value Update Record] check_op_value_update_record() at line 354 and clear_op_value_update_record() at line 376 - if these aren't atomic, can value update be called twice for same operation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Status Reset] set_status(VAULT_NORMAL_STATUS) at line 375 - if this fails midway, can vault remain in DURING_OPERATION permanently? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Oracle Manipulation] get_total_usd_value(clock) at lines 355-357 uses current clock - if attacker controls clock timestamp, can they manipulate oracle prices to hide losses? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Epoch Boundary] If end_op_value_update is called across epoch boundary, does tolerance reset before or after loss is calculated, affecting max loss checks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Event Emission] OperationValueUpdateChecked event at lines 368-373 - if loss is reported as 0 due to underflow but actual loss occurred, do off-chain systems detect the discrepancy? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Generic ObligationType] Line 299 has ObligationType generic but it's only used in the check loop - if wrong ObligationType is passed, does the check at line 342 pass incorrectly? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: end_op_value_update_with_bag()] [Multiple Assets Not Returned] If multiple assets from defi_asset_ids weren't returned, does the loop at lines 322-351 fail on first missing asset or check all and report all missing? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Reward Buffer Race] update_reward_buffers() at line 393 and update_receipt_reward() at line 396 - if another transaction updates rewards between these calls, can rewards be double-claimed? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Request ID Reuse] If request_id at line 395 points to already-executed deposit, does deposit_request() return stale data or fail safely? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Receipt Mismatch] deposit_request.receipt_id() at line 396 - if receipt_id doesn't match actual receipt owned by user, does update_receipt_reward() update wrong receipt's rewards? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Max Shares Slippage] max_shares_received at line 389 is passed to execute_deposit - if vault's share price crashes between user submission and execution, can operator execute at unfavorable rate? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: execute_deposit()] [Oracle Config Stale] OracleConfig at line 387 - if config contains stale price data, does execute_deposit use incorrect USD valuation for share calculation? (High)
